conbody.p: According to the About page on the Prose.io website, it is a "content authoring environment" that you can use to create files that will then appear in Github. It is a straightforward site for developing posts with formatting using html elements so you can write and share coded content on Github. In particular, it is a good way to access and create content within group repositories for a number of people to see. It is also a productive way of editing files that are already written.

Prose.io is useful for people who are trying to write or manage a lot of Github content and want to use the web rather than the complex Github desktop window. It can also be beneficial to those who are just learning about coding and want to try new things in a simplistic environment.
